name: whet
content:
whet verb
(INTEREST)
whet someone's appetite
Add to word list
Add to word list
to increase someone's interest in and wish for something, usually by giving them a small experience of it: I've read an excerpt of the book on the Web and it's whetted my appetite.
See more
whet verb
(SHARPEN)
[ T ] old use to sharpen the blade of a knife or similar tool: He whetted his knife against the stone.
